headline: The Campbell’s Company (CPB) Faces 4% Cost Hit From Steel, Aluminum Tariffs in Fiscal 2026
summary: We recently compiled a list of the 13 Best Bear Market Stocks to Buy Right Now. The Campbell’s Company is one of them. The Campbell’s Company (NASDAQ:CPB) is navigating rising costs from tariffs on steel and aluminum, which are critical for its canned goods production. Despite efforts to mitigate these expenses through supplier partnerships, alternative […]
